Election Timeline

  1. Application period
    11th to 22nd April
  2. Last day of application
    22nd April
  3. Mandatory candidate’s briefing
    25th April
  4. Campaigning period
    3rd to 6th May
  5. Balloting
    9th to 11th May
  6. Announcement of results
    13th of May
